articles.author: Trevor Cox
articles.title: Man suing ex-NFL QB Mark Sanchez, FOX Corporation after Indianapolis stabbing - WTHR
articles.description: Prosecutors charged 38-year-old Mark Sanchez with one felony and three misdemeanors for his alleged role in the Oct. 4 incident in downtown Indianapolis.
articles.content: INDIANAPOLIS A man who was hospitalized is now suing former NFL quarterback Mark Sanchez and FOX Corporation as Sanchez is facing multiple charges for his alleged role in the stabbing incident in dow… [+2049 chars]
